notes.text:
This update for libproxy fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-25219: Rewrote url::recvline to be nonrecursive (bsc#1176410).
- CVE-2020-26154: Fixed a buffer overflow when PAC is enabled (bsc#1177143).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: url::recvline in url.cpp in libproxy 0.4.x through 0.4.15 allows a remote HTTP server to trigger uncontrolled recursion via a response composed of an infinite stream that lacks a newline character. This leads to stack exhaustion.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: url.cpp in libproxy through 0.4.15 is prone to a buffer overflow when PAC is enabled, as demonstrated by a large PAC file that is delivered without a Content-length header.
